text: i've been watching both wallet UIs for a while (at least a couple minting rounds) and it's not doing anything, so something is presumably wrong - it's hard to pick out what though because the validator logs are very noisy so i don't know what if any of these messages are meaningful and what's just noise

text: looks like it was related to use-transfer-preapproval, when i set that to false it began working, and the receiver auto-accepts when the sender party ID is in autoAcceptTransfers, even if use-transfer-preapproval on the sender side is still false

text: Well, sponsor and scan addresses are mandatory fields to start a validator node. Also, your onboarding secret should be from the sponsor SV. Because if you got a secret from SV_1 and set SV_2 as your sponsor, you'll see other errors

elements.text: Well, sponsor and scan addresses are mandatory fields to start a validator node. Also, your onboarding secret should be from the sponsor SV. Because if you got a secret from SV_1 and set SV_2 as your sponsor, you'll see other errors
